mapper.select: select rownum , cartid , cartqty , prodname , prodimage , cartprice , prodstartdate || ' ~ ' || prodenddate as proddate , prodid , prodstock from( select c.cartid , c.cartqty , p.prodid , p.prodname , p.prodcateid , p.prodimage , p.prodprice * c.cartqty as cartprice , p.prodstock , p.prodinputdate , to_char(p.prodstartdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodstartdate , to_char(p.prodenddate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodenddate , p.prodcontent from cart c, products p where c.cartid like p.prodid||'%' and c.cartid like '%'||#{memid} ) a
